name: Fire Knife 3D
description:
Just press to throw the knife at the target, but be smart and do not hit on other knives.
Break log towers and test yourself in boss fights.
Complete hundreds of levels and earn coins to buy new knives. Collect the entire collection of the coolest blades and surprise your friends.
Waiting for you:
- Bright graphics!
- A lot of cool knives for the game!
- Challenging tests!
- A variety of bonuses and levels!
- And many, very many, just mega many chopped logs and other enemies!
Already ready to prove that you are the most dexterous knife thrower in the world? Then run the game!
Write your impressions and comments in the comments.
